snippet: In the swirl of publicity over long-ago cases of abuse at Horace Mann and Poly Prep is an underlying strain that says times were different and that a certain kind of ignorance prevailed back then.
abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column asserts that historical revisionism is at work in child sexual abuse cases currently unfolding at two of New York City's private schools, including Horace Mann School in the Bronx; says consistent theme in the defensive narrative of both cases, which involve abuse surfacing decades after it happened, is that times were different when the abuse occurred and that an ignorance about what constituted sexual abuse prevailed.
lead_paragraph: In the swirl of publicity over long-ago cases of abuse at Horace Mann and Poly Prep is an underlying strain that says times were different and that a certain kind of ignorance prevailed back then.

headline.seo: Revisionist History at Work in Sexual Abuse Cases
